General.Name: Sino Horizon Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Sino Horizon Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manages, sells, and leases real estate properties in China. It operates through Real-Estate Sales, Commercial Leasing, Property Management, and Others segments. The company's property portfolio includes residential, office buildings, and shopping malls. It also engages in parking lot business. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
